title: Lease renewal overview
content: Tenants receive renewal offers 90 days prior to expiration. Rent adjustments follow the market rent guidance matrix and require written acceptance via the portal.

title: Rent payment options
content: Rent is due on the 1st of each month with a 4-day grace period. Tenants can pay via ACH, credit card, or enroll in autopay. Late fees apply after day 5.

title: Maintenance escalation steps
content: Emergency repairs include active water leaks, HVAC outages below 40F, and safety risks. Automatically file a maintenance ticket with the on-call vendor and notify property managers via SMS.

title: Pet policy
content: Pets require prior approval, vaccination records, and a monthly pet rent of $35. Unauthorized pets can result in lease violations.
